an5.55:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an5.55:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena savatthiyam ubho mataputta vassavasam upagamimsu—
an5.55:1.10: Te otinnacitta sikkham apaccakkhaya dubbalyam anavikatva methunam dhammam patisevimsu.
an5.55:2.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
an5.55:2.2: “idha, bhante, savatthiyam ubho mataputta vassavasam upagamimsu—
an5.55:2.3: bhikkhu ca bhikkhuni ca, te annamannassa abhinham dassanakama ahesum, matapi puttassa abhinham dassanakama ahosi, puttopi mataram abhinham dassanakamo ahosi.
an5.55:2.4: Tesam abhinham dassana samsaggo ahosi, samsagge sati vissaso ahosi, vissase sati otaro ahosi, te otinnacitta sikkham apaccakkhaya dubbalyam anavikatva methunam dhammam patisevimsu”ti.
an5.55:3.2: ‘na mata putte sarajjati, putto va pana matari’ti?
an5.55:3.3: Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekarupampi samanupassami evam rajaniyam evam kamaniyam evam madaniyam evam bandhaniyam evam mucchaniyam evam antarayakaram anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya yathayidam, bhikkhave, itthirupam.
an5.55:3.4: Itthirupe, bhikkhave, satta ratta giddha gathita mucchita ajjhosanna.
an5.55:4.1: Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekasaddampi … ekagandhampi … ekarasampi … ekaphotthabbampi samanupassami evam rajaniyam evam kamaniyam evam madaniyam evam bandhaniyam evam mucchaniyam evam antarayakaram anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya yathayidam, bhikkhave, itthiphotthabbam.
an5.55:4.2: Itthiphotthabbe, bhikkhave, satta ratta giddha gathita mucchita ajjhosanna.
an5.55:5.1: Itthi, bhikkhave, gacchantipi purisassa cittam pariyadaya titthati;
an5.55:5.2: thitapi …pe… nisinnapi … sayanapi … hasantipi … bhanantipi … gayantipi … rodantipi … ugghatitapi … matapi purisassa cittam pariyadaya titthati.
an5.55:5.3: Yanhi tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya:
